News.Title: HCLTech Achieves Three AWS Competencies in Key Areas
News.Summary: HCLTech has been awarded AWS Competencies in Supply Chain, Security and High Performance Computing, reflecting its deep technical expertise and proven ability to deliver high-quality cloud solutions for complex business-critical workloads.

News.Title: HCLTech Named Leader in Digital Workplace Services
News.Summary: HCLTech recognized as Leader in Everest Group's Digital Workplace Services PEAK Matrix Assessment 2025, highlighting its GenAI-powered solutions and end-to-end IT services capabilities.

News.Title: HCL Technologies Partners with Circles for Telecom AI
News.Summary: HCL Technologies announces strategic partnership with Circles to enhance connectivity innovations for global telecom industry through AI and product engineering capabilities for MVNO and MVNE platforms.

News.Title: HCLTech Partners with HAESL for Aviation MRO Transformation
News.Summary: HCL Technologies announces strategic partnership with Hong Kong Aero Engine Services Limited to transform maintenance operations using iMRO/4 asset management solution integrated with SAP S/4HANA.

News.Title: HCLTech Partners with Guardian Life for AI Transformation
News.Summary: HCL Technologies announces multi-year strategic partnership with Guardian Life Insurance Company to accelerate AI-driven technology transformation and deliver seamless customer experience.

News.Title: HCL Technologies Partners With Western Union
News.Summary: HCL Technologies announces strategic partnership with Western Union to expand Global Capability Center in Hyderabad, focusing on advanced AI and new platform operating model for future payments systems.

News.Title: HCLTech Acquires Singapore's Finergic for $19M
News.Summary: HCL Technologies announces acquisition of Singapore-based Finergic Solutions for 19 million Singapore Dollars to strengthen wealth management capabilities, expected to close by April 30, 2026.

News.Title: HCL Technologies Announces Strategic Partnerships
News.Summary: HCL Technologies partners with Carahsoft Technology Corp for US public sector distribution and Team Global Express for AI-powered digital transformation in Australia and New Zealand.

News.Title: HCL Technologies Expands Partnership with Team Global
News.Summary: HCL Technologies selected by Team Global Express, Australia and New Zealand's largest multimodal logistics organization, to accelerate digital transformation with AI-powered solutions and end-to-end managed IT services.

News.Title: HCL Technologies Partners with Carahsoft for US Govt
News.Summary: HCL Technologies announces strategic partnership with Carahsoft Technology Corp to accelerate digital transformation for U.S. Federal, State, Local and Education agencies through advanced AI-driven solutions.

News.Title: HCLTech Named Leader in IDC MarketScape SASE Services
News.Summary: HCL Technologies recognized as Leader in IDC MarketScape: Worldwide Managed SASE Services 2025 Vendor Assessment, highlighting its multivendor ecosystem and AI-driven platforms.

News.Title: HCLTech Delivers 29% Returns Amid IT Sector Slump
News.Summary: HCLTech outperformed IT peers with 28.86% stock gains since 2022, while TCS, Infosys, and Wipro declined. Company's proactive AI strategy and stable growth drove investor confidence in challenging market conditions.

News.Title: HCLTech Wins Innovation Award at Ericsson Supplier Awards
News.Summary: HCL Technologies recognized by Ericsson for AI-driven capabilities and automation contributions enhancing operational efficiency through multi-year collaboration focused on zero-touch operations.

News.Title: HCLTech targets $2.5bn AI revenue in 2-3 years
News.Summary: HCLTech CEO C Vijayakumar reveals ambitious plans to scale AI-led businesses to $2-2.5 billion revenue in 2-3 years, driven by 'AI factory' and physical AI opportunities worth billions each.

News.Title: HCLTech Q3 FY26: Strong 4.8% YoY Growth, $3B Bookings
News.Summary: HCLTech delivers robust Q3 FY26 performance with revenue of $3.79 billion, up 4.8% YoY. Company crosses $15 billion annualized revenue milestone with strong AI-driven bookings of $3 billion.

News.Title: HCLTech Elevates Sandeep Saxena as Chief Growth Officer
News.Summary: HCL Technologies announces elevation of company veteran Sandeep Saxena to Chief Growth Officer for India and strategic markets, strengthening focus on India's growth opportunities.

News.Title: HCL Tech Reports $3B Bookings on AI Demand Surge
News.Summary: HCL Technologies delivered exceptional $3 billion TCV bookings in Q3, driven by AI-led discretionary spending and advanced AI revenue growing 20% sequentially to $146 million with stable margins at 18.6%.

News.Title: TCS vs HCL Tech: Q3 Results Drive Mixed Brokerage Views
News.Summary: TCS and HCL Technologies delivered strong Q3 FY26 performance with revenue growth of 4.87% and 13.32% YoY respectively, driven by robust AI services expansion and strategic partnerships, though brokerages remain divided on valuations.

News.Title: HCL Tech outpaces TCS with strong Q3 growth, deal wins
News.Summary: HCL Technologies reports 4.2% sequential growth and $3 billion TCV, raising FY26 guidance, while TCS shows modest 0.8% growth with declining deal wins, highlighting divergent performance in IT sector demand recovery.

News.Title: HCLTech CEO on AI revenue growth and future strategy
News.Summary: HCLTech reports $146 million in advanced AI revenue for Q3 with 46% sequential growth. CEO C Vijayakumar discusses AI impact on deal renewals and transformation of IT services delivery models.

News.Title: Morgan Stanley Initiates Buy Rating on HCL Tech
News.Summary: Morgan Stanley has initiated a tactical buy rating on HCL Technologies, citing expectations of near-term outperformance driven by improving FY27 growth visibility and margin targets of approximately 18%.

News.Title: HCLTech Q3 Strong Performance Boosts FY27 Confidence
News.Summary: HCLTech reports robust Q3FY26 with ₹33,872 cr revenue and ₹4,076 cr profit. Strong bookings up 30% YoY give management confidence for FY27 despite global volatility. Restructuring costs capped at 50 bps.

News.Title: HCL Tech Q3 Results Beat Estimates, Raises Guidance
News.Summary: HCL Technologies reported strong Q3FY26 results with 13.3% YoY revenue growth to ₹33,872 crore and raised FY26 guidance. Stock gained 0.11% despite mixed analyst views following better-than-expected performance.

News.Title: ICICI Securities Maintains Hold on HCL Tech at ₹1,590
News.Summary: HCL Technologies beats revenue estimates with 4.2% QoQ growth, driven by software products and strong deal momentum. ICICI Securities sets target price at ₹1,590 with Hold rating.

News.Title: HCLTech Gets 'Hold' Rating After Revenue Beat
News.Summary: ICICI Securities maintains 'Hold' rating on HCLTech following strong Q3 performance with 4.2% QoQ constant currency growth, beating estimates of 2.2% and consensus of 2.8%.

News.Title: HCL Tech Q3 beats estimates; Motilal sets ₹2200 target
News.Summary: HCL Technologies reported strong Q3FY26 results with revenue of $3.80 billion, up 4.20% QoQ in constant currency, beating estimates. Motilal Oswal maintains BUY rating with target price of ₹2,200.

News.Title: HCL Tech Gets Buy Rating with ₹1,910 Target Price
News.Summary: Prabhudas Lilladher recommends buying HCL Technologies with target price of ₹1,910, citing strong Q3 revenue growth of 4.2% QoQ and robust performance across services and software segments.

News.Title: HCL Tech Q3 results drive 2% stock surge Tuesday
News.Summary: HCL Technologies shares gained nearly 2% following mixed Q3 FY26 results featuring steady revenue growth and margin expansion, reported Monday by the Noida-based IT services company.

News.Title: HCLTech Downgraded Despite Q3 Beat Performance
News.Summary: Dolat Capital downgrades HCLTech to 'Reduce' rating citing limited near-term upside potential despite the company's strong Q3 performance, accelerating deal conversions, and resilient margins following recent stock price gains.

News.Title: HCLTech Q3 Net Profit Falls 3.8% Due to Labour Code Impact
News.Summary: HCL Technologies reported Q3 net profit of ₹4,076 crore, down 3.8% QoQ due to ₹956 crore one-time impact from new labour codes. Revenue grew 6% to ₹33,872 crore with strong AI segment performance.

News.Title: HCL Tech Q3 profit drops 11% YoY despite revenue growth
News.Summary: HCL Technologies reported 11% decline in Q3 net profit to ₹4,076 crore despite 13% revenue growth to ₹33,872 crore. Share price fell over 1% following results announcement.

News.Title: HCL Tech shares slip despite strong Q3 performance
News.Summary: HCL Technologies stock dropped 0.50% in early trade following Q3 FY26 results as brokerages remain cautious about near-term upside despite solid operational performance and guidance upgrade.

News.Title: CLSA Sets Hold Rating on HCL Tech at ₹1,661
News.Summary: CLSA maintains Hold rating on HCL Technologies with target price of ₹1,661.00, reflecting cautious outlook on the IT services major's near-term prospects.

News.Title: Nomura Upgrades HCL Tech with ₹1,810 Target Price
News.Summary: Global brokerage firm Nomura has issued a buy recommendation for HCL Technologies with a target price of ₹1,810 per share, indicating positive outlook for the IT services company.

News.Title: HSBC Sets Hold Rating on HCL Tech at ₹1,815
News.Summary: HSBC maintains Hold rating on HCL Technologies with target price of ₹1,815, reflecting cautious outlook on the IT services major's near-term prospects.

News.Title: CITI Sets Neutral Rating on HCL Tech at ₹1,700
News.Summary: CITI maintains neutral stance on HCL Technologies with target price of ₹1,700, reflecting cautious outlook on the IT services major's near-term prospects.

News.Title: Macquarie Sets HCL Tech Target at ₹2,080
News.Summary: Macquarie maintains outperform rating on HCL Technologies with a target price of ₹2,080, indicating positive analyst sentiment for the IT services major.

News.Title: Morgan Stanley Raises HCL Tech Target to ₹1,760
News.Summary: Morgan Stanley maintains Equal Weight rating on HCL Technologies with revised target price of ₹1,760 per share, reflecting updated valuation assessment.

News.Title: Kotak Maintains 'Reduce' on HCL Tech at ₹1,680
News.Summary: Kotak Securities maintains its 'Reduce' rating on HCL Technologies with a price target of ₹1,680, reflecting cautious outlook on the IT services major's near-term prospects.

News.Title: HCL Tech Q3: Strong fundamentals, cautious outlook
News.Summary: HCL Technologies delivered robust Q3 performance with 43% YoY jump in deal TCV and upgraded guidance to 4.75-5.25%, but brokerages remain cautious on near-term stock prospects citing seasonality concerns.

News.Title: HCL Tech Q3 profit drops 11% YoY despite revenue growth
News.Summary: HCL Technologies reported 11% decline in Q3FY26 net profit to ₹4,076 crore, while revenue grew 13% YoY to ₹33,872 crore. Brokerages maintain positive outlook with target prices up to ₹1,810.

News.Title: HCL Tech Updates Guidance Parameters in Concall
News.Summary: HCL Technologies clarifies guidance methodology, excluding new acquisitions from projections while incorporating restructuring costs into margin guidance during recent conference call.

News.Title: HCL Tech Q3 Operating Margin Dips 13 Basis Points YoY
News.Summary: HCL Technologies reports a slight decline in Q3 operating margin by 13 basis points year-over-year. Management remains optimistic about future recovery prospects during conference call.

News.Title: HCL Tech Raises FY Services Revenue Growth Forecast
News.Summary: HCL Technologies has increased its full-year services revenue growth forecast to 4.75%-5.25% in constant currency, while maintaining EBIT margin guidance at 17%-18%.

News.Title: HCLTech Q3 beats estimates; analysts raise targets
News.Summary: HCL Technologies reported strong Q3 performance with 4.2% constant-currency revenue growth, beating estimates. Company raised FY26 guidance while analysts increased price targets despite valuation concerns.

News.Title: HCLTech Revises Q3 Dividend Record Date to Jan 17
News.Summary: HCL Technologies shifts Q3 dividend record date to January 17 due to BMC election holiday, maintaining ₹12 per share payout. Company reports mixed Q3 results with revenue growth but profit decline.

News.Title: HCLTech Q3 Results: Brokerages Hike Target Prices
News.Summary: HCLTech reported Q3 profit of ₹4,076 crore, impacted by ₹956 crore labour code provision. Morgan Stanley, Kotak Securities, and Citi raised target prices despite mixed performance signals.

News.Title: IT Q3 earnings: TCS, HCL Tech beat estimates
News.Summary: TCS and HCL Technologies reported better-than-expected Q3 results. HCL Tech achieved nine-quarter high order booking of $3.01 billion and raised FY26 guidance, while TCS maintained $9.30 billion in new deals.

News.Title: HCL Technologies Q3 Results: Revenue Rises, Profit Dips
News.Summary: HCL Technologies reported Q3 revenue of ₹3,387.40 crores, up from ₹3,194.20 crores QoQ, but net profit declined to ₹407.60 crores from ₹423.50 crores, missing estimates.

News.Title: HCL Technologies Shifts Dividend Record Date
News.Summary: HCL Technologies changes interim dividend record date from January 16 to January 17, 2026 due to Maharashtra Municipal Corporation Elections trading holiday, while maintaining payment date of January 27, 2026.
